thread.title: BIG shout out to the ghost Cardinals
thread.title_full: BIG shout out to the ghost Cardinals

author: LoyaltyisaCurse
title: BIG shout out to the ghost Cardinals
text: BIG shout out to the ghost Cardinals In honor of Halloween: Thank you for your contribution. Who's your ghost? "Going from the Raiders receivers to Larry Fitzgerald is like trading a Spam dinner for a well-aged T-bone steak." --Dan Hanzus When I play rock, paper, scissors, I keep a glass of water in my hand and when my opponent throws down I throw the water in his face and say "Water". Beats all three, scissors can't cut-it, paper dissolves and the rock sinks. Plus it usually surprises the hell out of them.
